actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: To direct the President to withdraw from the Dominican Republic-Central America-United States Free Trade Agreement.
short_title: Fair Trade for All Act of 2005

summary.text: Fair Trade for All Act of 2005 - Directs the President to withdraw the United States from the Dominican Republic-Central America-United States Free Trade Agreement entered into on August 5, 2004, with the governments of Costa Rica, the Dominican Republic, El Salvador, Guatemala, Honduras, and Nicaragua.

titles.title: Fair Trade for All Act of 2005
To direct the President to withdraw from the Dominican Republic-Central America-United States Free Trade Agreement.
